explains: adj. （计算机）独立运行的；（公司、组织）独立的

sentences.en: They plan to relaunch it as a stand-alone company.
sentences.cn: 他们计划把它重新创办成一家独立的公司。

sentences.en: Johnson Johnson, for example, has created BabyCenter, a stand-alone media property that promotes complementary and even competitive products.
sentences.cn: 例如，强生创建了 BabyCenter，一家推广互补性乃至竞争性产品的独立媒体公司。

sentences.en: Devote spare time of yours to accompany the amentia students on playing and studying by showing them your behavior to upgrade their stand-alone capability.
sentences.cn: 奉献你的时间，陪同智障学员一起游戏和学习，通过自身行为引导智障学员，提升学员的独立能力。
